Company Overview

ORANGESCAPE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED is a 20.8 Years old company, incorporated on 11 Dec 2003. It is classified as Private UnListed Indian Non-Government Company. Its authorized share capital is ₹2,50,00,000.00 ( ₹2.50 Cr ) and its paid up capital is ₹51,59,850.00 ( ₹51.60 Lakhs ). As per MCA the main line of business is Computer And Related Activities.

ORANGESCAPE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED's Annual General Meeting (AGM) was last held on 22 Sep 2023 and as per records from Ministry of Corporate Affairs (MCA), its balance sheet was last filed on 31 Mar 2023.

ORANGESCAPE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED's unique Corporate Identification Number (CIN) is U72200TN2003PTC052129 and its registration number is 52129. It is registered at RoC-Chennai.

The company is incorporated with the address 5/142;10th Floor; Rajiv Gandhi Salai; Perungudi; World Trade Centre; Unit 1002&1003;EastW ing ; TowerB; Old Mahabalipuram Road; Chennai; Tamil Nadu; 600096; India.

The current status of the company is Active.

Industry Classification
